TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentLocator extends System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: Represents an ordered set of elements that identify an item of content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements defined in a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> provides a structured means to reference an external data item.
The process of resolving each <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> in sequence provides the context to resolve the next <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this .
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy clone of this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was `true.`
When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or the current animation values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.GetSchema%2A> method is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of elements that make up this .
Docs.value: The collection of elements that make up this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> collection returned will never be `null`. If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool StartsWith(class System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator locator) cil managed

Docs.param: The with the list of elements to compare with this .
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the starting sequence of elements in a specified are identical to those in this .
Docs.returns: if the starting sequence of elements in this matches those in the specified ; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> returns `true` the starting sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements in this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> matches those in the specified `locator`.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator.StartsWith%2A> returns `false` if the specified `locator` contains <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements that are different, in a different order, or more than in this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>.
